skills.skill: Compliance and Privacy Regulations (GDPR, CCPA, HIPAA)

duties_responsibilities.duty: Guide engineering teams to ensure transparent data collection and usage practices, protect user privacy, and mitigate risk
Design and implement privacy capabilities, patterns, and policies integrated into products, providing technical consulting on privacy for product teams
Use 3rd party commercial tooling (e.g., OneTrust, JIRA) for privacy reviews and tracking issues
Analyze and audit data lifecycle to ensure privacy requirements are met
Build relationships with technical and compliance teams to deliver privacy-by-design controls incorporated into engineering deployments

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or a similar technical field (Master's degree preferred)
Certifications related to privacy, such as CIPP, CIPT, or CIPM
